EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.title: Tesla clone with Astro and Tailwind CSS
EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.description: As the main goal of the project, the Tesla website was cloned using Astro and Tailwind CSS. The technologies used were Astro, Tailwind CSS and JavaScript. The website has a responsive design, which means it can be used on any device. Finally, it has a menu that can be opened by clicking on the button in the upper right corner.

EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.title: Real-time chat development with Node.js, Socket.io and SQL with TursoDB web app.
Web de un equipo de Volleyball
EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.description: The main goal of this project was to develop a website for a volleyball club with a friendly and modern interface. The website has a responsive design, which means it can be used on any device. The technologies used include Next.js 13, HTML, Tailwind CSS and JavaScript.

EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.title: Trabajo de fin de grado por la Universidad Miguel Hernández de Elche
EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.description: This TFG developed a Dockerized web application with PostgreSQL and JSON for multilingual support. The RestAPI in Python with Flask included password encryption and JWT authentication. A CMS was implemented with CRUD, Nightwatch tests and Bootstrap frontend to create and answer questionnaires in an efficient environment.

SEO_DESCRIPTION: Full Stack Web Developer, specialized in web application development
INTRO_SUBTITLE_AFTER_STRONG: for my evolution as a developer. From Aspe, Alicante.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_AFTER_SPAN: in a new project that gives me the opportunity to add value to society.
